programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Birthday Treat) S2 (25/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Birthday Treat»The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday, but they lose him on the way!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Finds a Pigeon / Paddington and the Chores List) S1 (1/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Pigeon / Paddington and the Chores List»A pigeon falls down the Brown family's chimney, and Paddington is going to take care of it ... Paddington, like the rest of the family, wants to do tasks. But ... can he?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La capsule du temps) S2 (9/52)
programme.desc: «La capsule du temps»Madame Gazelle makes a time capsule with the class. As soon as it is buried, Peppa wants to dig it up again, but Madame Gazelle knows something better. They dig up their parents' capsule when they were little. And that is very funny!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le recyclage) S2 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le recyclage»There is nothing more fun than sailing a boat .. isn't it? Peppa is a little dissatisfied with her boat at first, but then she discovers that sailing with paper boats is the most fun!

programme.title: Peppa Pig en anglais (Daddy Pig's Office) S2 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Daddy Pig's Office»

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Peppa et ses amis passent une journée sur le bateau du grand-père de Peppa...

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (Le Jour le plus lent de Villavite) S6 (n°33)
programme.desc: «Le Jour le plus lent de Villavite»Everything is fast in Zippy City, from the trolley to the mail. But when Tiny the Slug and the Opposites Crew slow everything down to the opposite of fast with sticky slime, Detectives Zooli and Goby have to stop them before it's too late!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon) S3 (13/18)
programme.desc: «Blue's Treasure of the Clue Lagoon»Come on a beach adventure to Rainbow Cove with Blue, Josh and Rainbow Puppy! According to legend, there's a fantastic hidden treasure, and Rainbow Puppy wants Josh and Blue's help finding it.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (14/18)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers) S1 (21/21)
programme.desc: «Le Carnaval / Le Cheval des Mers»The biggest party of the year could be cancelled after Escarlata la Pirata freezes the high seas! // Bonnie Bones is on the run with the museum's priceless treasures, but Santi and crew won't let her get far.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Chickcharney Island) S2 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Chickcharney Island»Return to Merlandia: The crew return to Merlandia for an underwater fair, but must save the day when the power grid becomes overloaded. (S2, ep 8b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (William vs. Wild) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «William vs. Wild»After making up a lie to sound brave, William is forced to face his fears and travel into the super scary Kelp Woods.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Lost Jelly) S1 (24/28)
programme.desc: «The Lost Jelly»The Lost Jelly: When an out-of-this-world visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark and his friends must put their stellar communication skills to the test. (S1, ep 22a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Ants on a Log) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Ants on a Log»Ants on a Log: Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! (S1, ep 7a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le sauvetage des parachutistes / Les cupcakes d'Alex) S7 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Le sauvetage des parachutistes / Les cupcakes d'Alex»Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et Lucky) S1 (26/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et Lucky»Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La garderie à domicile) S1 (30/52)
programme.desc: «La garderie à domicile»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La leçon de danse) S1 (31/52)
programme.desc: «La leçon de danse»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'orage) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «L'orage»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (7/78)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (8/78)
programme.desc: «The Nap»The Nap: Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep! (S1, ep 8).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure) S3 (12/18)
programme.desc: «Rainbow Puppy's Skidoo Adventure»Josh and Blue are having a playdate with our friend Rainbow Puppy, who makes everything extra exciting! We play a special game of Rainbow Puppy's Clues to figure out where she wants to go, leaping from skidoo to skidoo and looking for clues.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La mine d'or perdue / La maison connectée de l'oncle Otis) S7 (13/26)
programme.desc: «La mine d'or perdue / La maison connectée de l'oncle Otis»Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine. After wandering off course, Ryder and the Pups must save him from the booby-trapped mine. // Uncle Otis's installs a Smart Home 3000, in his cabin, that ends up trapping Uncle Otis and Mr. Wingnut inside!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Bay) S1 (14/26)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Bay»Ryder and the PAW Patrol clean up a small oil spill in the water to save the animals in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Panique au jardin public / Complètement givré»Rammy's tips about focus and meditation come in handy when Mister Staal's Replicator makes donuts rain in Midden Bos. When Kai takes out his Hydropower on an ice cream machine, it turns into an unhinged ice bot!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts»Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football) S1 (4/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football»The Adventures of Paddington is a new version of a familiar bear. It's a heartwarming show about being curious, being good to others, and being part of a loving family.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Mac and Cheese) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Mac and Cheese»Mac and Cheese: Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! (S1, ep 8a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue) S1 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Le camping en famille / La parade de bienvenue»It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Extreme Dodge Bubble) S2 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Extreme Dodge Bubble»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christopher) S1 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Super Christopher»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (9/78)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Magic Trick) S1 (57/78)
programme.desc: «The Magic Trick»Magic Trick: Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! (S1, ep 57).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Go Find It!: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, and the first team who does will win the game. (S1, ep 58).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Stay Over) S1 (n°59)
programme.desc: «The Stay Over»When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything to get him to stop, without disturbing his nap.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Snow Dream) S1 (n°60)
programme.desc: «Snow Dream»Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le lavage de la voiture) S1 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le lavage de la voiture»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le déjeuner) S1 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le déjeuner»Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping) S1 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La princesse fatiguée) S1 (36/52)
programme.desc: «La princesse fatiguée»Papa Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a sleepy princess. In the story Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mama Pig is the queen and Papa Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le match de basket) S4 (3/52)
programme.desc: «Le match de basket»Peppa and her friends learn to play basketball, and their coach is Daddy Pig. He will teach them the rules- how to bounce the ball, tackling,... and in the end, they will play a game against a bigger, and older team.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Dada-Cabriole) S4 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Dada-Cabriole»Peppa and George get a special package from their Aunt Dottie who lives far away, in another country. When Mr Zebra delivers it, Peppa and George will have to share the present and play with it together.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vilaine Tortue) S4 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vilaine Tortue»Tiddles the Tortoise, Doctor Hamster's pet, has got stuck up a tree, again! Who can save him? (Subtitled) (Audio Described) (Also in HD).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Perfect Dinner) S1 (23/52)
programme.desc: «The Perfect Dinner»Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Fast Friends) S3 (16/20)
programme.desc: «Fast Friends»Blaze, AJ, and Gabby meet a brand new monster machine named Watts - a super fast truck with electric tires! But when one of her special tires goes rolling into the jungle, Blaze, AJ, and Gabby promise to help her get it back.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Semi-Remorque Blaze) S5 (13/20)
programme.desc: «Semi-Remorque Blaze»When a windstorm blows away the supplies for Stripes' Animal Party, Blaze transforms into the one Monster Machine strong enough to haul it all back - a Big Rig! There's nothing he can't pull with that Big Rig Force!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le robot-serveur détraqué / La Pat'Patrouille contre le tartouragan) S7 (5/26)
programme.desc: «Le robot-serveur détraqué / La Pat'Patrouille contre le tartouragan»Mr. Porter's high tech waiter robot helps around the café, but it can't stop cleaning! It's up to the Pups to clean up the mess all over town! // Mayor Humdinger creates a cyclone of delicious pies! The Pups must stop it before the town is covered.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les trois oiseaux / La course de caisse à savon) S7 (10/26)
programme.desc: «Les trois oiseaux / La course de caisse à savon»Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Petit mais fort / Puissance pomme de pin) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Petit mais fort / Puissance pomme de pin»Sir Steel wants to shrink the trees in the Central Forest to make way for his new tower. Deer Squad have to think small to stop him! // Lola and her souped-up Rocket Rabbit wake the residents of the Central Forest with all the engine's roars.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Party People) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Party People»Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Birthday Treat) S2 (25/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Birthday Treat»The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday, but they lose him on the way!

programme.desc: «Paddington Finds a Pigeon / Paddington and the Chores List»A pigeon falls down the Brown family's chimney, and Paddington is going to take care of it ... Paddington, like the rest of the family, wants to do tasks. But ... can he?

programme.desc: «Le recyclage»There is nothing more fun than sailing a boat .. isn't it? Peppa is a little dissatisfied with her boat at first, but then she discovers that sailing with paper boats is the most fun!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bureau de papa Pig) S2 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Le bureau de papa Pig»Peppa et George vont au bureau de leur père et rencontrent les gens avec qui il travaille...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île aux pirates) S2 (23/52)
programme.desc: «L'île aux pirates»Peppa et ses amis passent une journée sur le bateau du grand-père de Peppa...

programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (The Lost Jelly) S1 (24/28)
programme.desc: «The Lost Jelly»The Lost Jelly: When an out-of-this-world visitor blows into Carnivore Cove, Baby Shark and his friends must put their stellar communication skills to the test. (S1, ep 22a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Ants on a Log) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Ants on a Log»Ants on a Log: Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! (S1, ep 7a).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le sauvetage des parachutistes / Les cupcakes d'Alex) S7 (11/26)
programme.desc: «Le sauvetage des parachutistes / Les cupcakes d'Alex»Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington et Lucky) S1 (26/54)
programme.desc: «Paddington et Lucky»Paddington meets Mateo's dog Lucky! Paddington tries to teach him tricks, but Lucky will not behave. It's Love Day in Windsor Gardens!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les marionnettes de Chloé) S1 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Les marionnettes de Chloé»Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa fait de l'exercice) S1 (42/52)
programme.desc: «Papa fait de l'exercice»Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le rangement) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Le rangement»Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Cuddle Toy) S1 (11/78)
programme.desc: «The Cuddle Toy»The Cuddle Toy: Christopher is sad because he lost his cuddly toy so Bubu gives him his to use. But when Christopher loses that one too, it's a desperate search for missing cuddlies! (S1, ep 11).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (12/78)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Joyeux anniversaire, Blue !) S1 (11/17)
programme.desc: «Joyeux anniversaire, Blue !»It's Blue's birthday! We're playing Blue's Clues to figure out what present Blue wants for her birthday. While we look for Clues, we help Josh get ready for the party by observing patterns & take a trip to Joe's Present Store.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Gros orage sur la Grande Vallée / La ruée vers l'or) S5 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Gros orage sur la Grande Vallée / La ruée vers l'or»Skye is on her way to Jake's Mountain when she crash lands in the snow. Ryder calls Everest to save the day!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble) S1 (n°6)
programme.desc: «La Créature du lac / Collés ensemble»A shipment of plastic is dumped in the Crystal Lake. A lake monster appears and Rammy must overcome his fear of rednessing everyone. When Lola and Mister Steel get stuck together, they are forced to work together.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Steel Antlers / Berry Bad) S1 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Steel Antlers / Berry Bad»Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure) S1 (6/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Painting / Paddington Finds Buried Treasure»Mrs. Brown can't find inspiration for her next art work so Paddington decides to help find her mojo! // Jonathan and Paddington dig up some broken pottery that turns out to be a statue made by Mrs. Brown. But who broke it?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «Barbibul a un secret / Trop trop la classe»Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Barbidou ne sait pas dire non / Le sosie»Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué) S1 (n°26)
programme.desc: «Le jeu des meilleurs amis / Le poisson masqué»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Fort de l'Aquamitié) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Le Fort de l'Aquamitié»Fort Fin-ship: When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. (S2, ep 1a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le ukulélé) S1 (10/78)
programme.desc: «Le ukulélé»Anna, Froga and Ron make up a song that Anna plays on her ukulele. But they accidentally end up breaking her cherished instrument in half! (S1, ep 10).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Friendship Journal) S1 (15/78)
programme.desc: «Friendship Journal»Anna decides to make a scrapbook to celebrate Friendship, where each try to come up with something special enough to deserve the first page in her "friendship journal.".

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Backwards Day) S1 (61/78)
programme.desc: «Backwards Day»Backwards Ron Day: Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. (S1, ep 61).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Stuck) S1 (n°62)
programme.desc: «Stuck»Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Echange de rôles) S1 (63/78)
programme.desc: «Echange de rôles»Switcheroo: When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (La chaussette disparue) S1 (64/78)
programme.desc: «La chaussette disparue»When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his Smell Better Machine.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Ma cousine Chloé) S1 (28/52)
programme.desc: «Ma cousine Chloé»Peppa and George's cousin Chloe comes to their house. Peppa tries to show Chloe that she is a big girl, but it is very hard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le bateau de papi) S1 (48/52)
programme.desc: «Le bateau de papi»Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Supermarché) S1 (49/52)
programme.desc: «Le Supermarché»Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Mon anniversaire) S1 (50/52)
programme.desc: «Mon anniversaire»It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de Monsieur Fox) S4 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de Monsieur Fox»Granny and Grandpa Pig are celebrating their anniversary, and Peppa and George go to Mr Fox's shop to buy them a present. The shop is full of different things, so siblings don't know what to choose for their grandparents.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les ombres) S4 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Les ombres»Peppa and George notice they have shadows, and no matter how fast they walk, run, or jump - they can't lose them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Journée Internationale) S4 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Journée Internationale»Peppa and her friends at playgroup dress up in clothes from different countries all over the world, but then have an argument.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Going into the Wild) S1 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Going into the Wild»For Halloween, the Barbababies play wolf and have fun scaring each other.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Abra-ka-Pickle) S5 (5/20)
programme.desc: «Abra-ka-Pickle»Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La super course de l'espace) S5 (9/20)
programme.desc: «La super course de l'espace»Blaze and AJ take off into space for a race that's out of this world! Along the way to Planet Victory, they meet friendly aliens, dodge asteroids, and face off against Crusher's space ship!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Montgolfière en fuite) S5 (14/20)
programme.desc: «Montgolfière en fuite»All of Axle City is enjoying the Balloon Fair - until Crusher and Pickle get stuck on a runaway hot-air balloon! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to rescue their high-flying friends... before they crash into the Slime Volcano!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La famille Blaze) S5 (18/20)
programme.desc: «La famille Blaze»Blaze and AJ are spending the day with some very special trucks: Blaze's family! His Mom, Dad, and little sister Sparkle join Blaze in a race against Crusher to prove they're the world's fastest family!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Big Rig to the Rescue!) S6 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Big Rig to the Rescue!»When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.
